name: Casper: Friends Around the World
description: The Friendly Ghost finally has many human friends, but the evil Kibosh, who is spying on him with his crystal ball, is unhappy with Casper hanging out with these "fleshies" so he uses a machine to teleport all of Casper friends around the world, so the little ghost never will be able to see them again, but Casper finds a Map that shows his friends' whereabouts.
